attributes.action: Give a fair pay to Home Carers at the moment  living in near poverty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Home Carers save this (and the next) Government £57 Billion per year. This is the same amount as the current NHS bill in total. For this saving the Government pays     
just £48.65 to carers (60% of whom have to  
give up work to look after a loved one).
  Not all carers are old, living in homes that have little or no mortgage, a lot have young families and and all the bills that go with them.
Please try to change this heartbreaking situation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
